verses.verse: Thinkest <WH2803> <WH8804> thou this to be right <WH4941>, that thou saidst <WH559> <WH8804>, My righteousness <WH6664> is more than 'Elohim's <WH410> ?
For thou saidst <WH559> <WH8799>, What advantage <WH5532> <WH8799> will it be unto thee? and, What profit <WH3276> <WH8686> shall I have, if I be cleansed from my sin <WH2403> ?
I will answer <WH7725> <WH8686> <WH4405> thee, and thy companions <WH7453> with thee.
Look <WH5027> <WH8685> unto the heavens <WH8064>, and see <WH7200> <WH8798>; and behold <WH7789> <WH8798> the clouds <WH7834> which are higher <WH1361> <WH8804> than thou.
If thou sinnest <WH2398> <WH8804>, what doest <WH6466> <WH8799> thou against him? or if thy transgressions <WH6588> be multiplied <WH7231> <WH8804>, what doest <WH6213> <WH8799> thou unto him?
If thou be righteous <WH6663> <WH8804>, what givest <WH5414> <WH8799> thou him? or what receiveth <WH3947> <WH8799> he of thine hand <WH3027> ?
Thy wickedness <WH7562> may hurt a man <WH376> as thou art; and thy righteousness <WH6666> may profit the son <WH1121> of man <WH120>.
By reason of the multitude <WH7230> of oppressions <WH6217> they make the oppressed to cry <WH2199> <WH8686>: they cry out <WH7768> <WH8762> by reason of the arm <WH2220> of the mighty <WH7227>.
But none saith <WH559> <WH8804>, Where is 'Elohim <WH433> my maker <WH6213> <WH8802>, who giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> songs <WH2158> in the night <WH3915>;
Who teacheth <WH502> <WH8764> us more than the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776>, and maketh us wiser <WH2449> <WH8762> than the fowls <WH5775> of heaven <WH8064> ?
There they cry <WH6817> <WH8799>, but none giveth answer <WH6030> <WH8799>, because <WH6440> of the pride <WH1347> of evil men <WH7451>.
Surely 'Elohim <WH410> will not hear <WH8085> <WH8799> vanity <WH7723>, neither will 'El SHaddai <WH7706> regard <WH7789> <WH8799> it.
Although <WH637> thou sayest <WH559> <WH8799> thou shalt not see <WH7789> <WH8799> him, yet judgment <WH1779> is before <WH6440> him; therefore trust <WH2342> <WH8787> thou in him.
But now, because it is not so, he hath visited <WH6485> <WH8804> in his anger <WH639>; yet he knoweth <WH3045> <WH8804> it not in great <WH3966> extremity <WH6580>:
Therefore doth I-yov <WH347> open <WH6475> <WH8799> his mouth <WH6310> in vain <WH1892>; he multiplieth <WH3527> <WH8686> words <WH4405> without <WH1097> knowledge <WH1847>.
